definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">stopsound @a record</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="block_nbt_logic_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">musicPlaying</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="block_nbt_num_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">playingSlot</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="block_nbt_num_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">songTimer</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">PlayCurrentDisc</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
